Articles.Content: The servers! They can't take it anymore!
I love the smell of page 500 in the late afternoon.

> 
> It can be improved, but it's ok as a starter record-breaker.

True. Oh man, the forums ain't workin' so well right now..
Congrats on effective DDoS
The 502 is back again!

> 
> I guess I could be boring, go get dinner, and by that time it'll probs be released. But then I'll miss out on hype. Decisions decisions.

Food not necessary. Need hype to live.
Just encountered a huge 502 gate

> 
> Quick find x for the dimensions of the hype train

X= >< = y|y=hype

> 
> I love the smell of page 500 in the late afternoon.

..it smells like 1.0?

> 
> Congrats on effective DDoS

Quiet you.
Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet?

> 
> I love the smell of page 500 in the late afternoon.

Smells like 1.0.

> 
> Just encountered a huge 502 gate

is that like a watergate? 502gate? D:

(I am not a crook~)

> 
> I love the smell of page 500 in the late afternoon.

To SQUAD it smells like melting metal and plastic.
Too many 502's.

> 
> Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet?

NO! (unfortunately)

> 
> True. Oh man, the forums ain't workin' so well right now..

Heh. DOn't I know it. Still, it lets you in on the third refresh!
Hype!!!
480, left for 5 minutes now 516... the train....ITS GOING TO FAST!!!!!! MAKE IT QUICKER
